attributes.action: Give anyone who scraps their car a free bus pass.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The internal combustion engined car has reached the end of its useful life. The cost to the nation of importing oil is now catastrophic economically. Apart from air pollution they are a totally planet damaging form of transport.
It would be a good move to offer free bus passes to anyone who gave up their motor car.
